messages.subject: what a world (was Ashley)
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/30/03 7:12:06 PM, melindav98@triad.rr.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/30/03 7:12:06 PM, melindav98@... writes:

<< No one can take you off the list - you have to do that yourself under your
Yahoo Groups preferences. >>

I would hate to live in a world where no one could take anyone off a list.

I'm also not thrilled about being in a world where people who have no clue
how to get off a list the signed on to would be homeschoolers. People do
learn more about computers and people do ask nicely sometimes. I hope those
who can do neither will put their kids in school, though.

Sandra
